price: ataukah mereka dengki kepada manusia (Muhammad) lantaran karunia311 yang Allah telah berikan kepadanya? Sesungguhnya Kami telah memberikan Kitab dan Hikmah kepada keluarga Ibrāhīm, dan Kami telah memberikan kepadanya kerajaan yang besar.
arabic: أَمۡ يَحۡسُدُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۖ فَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ ءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مُّلۡكًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am yaḥsudūna al-nāsa ʿalā mā ātāhumu al-lahu min faḍlihi faqad ātaynā āla ib'rāhīma al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata waātaynāhum mul'kan ʿaẓīman
